entry.title: The Fate of Evan Buckley
entry.summary:
Author: spinbottles

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,908Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: Buck has always believed he has a predetermined fate when it comes to love. Whenever something new blossoms, it dies, and he can’t tell whether it’s his fate that the world has set up in such a proportionate way that he can’t ever find his person. But now that he thinks about it, he begins to realize that there is one person who has always been there for him despite the flaws he’s shown everyone he’s left, and that they’ve stayed. That person is Eddie, and come to realize it, does that mean Eddie is the one who saved Buck’s heart from the fate of Evan Buckley?   Inspired by “The Fate of Ophelia” by Taylor Swift.

entry.title: recovery
entry.summary:
Author: titaniclikeship003

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,797Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 2

Summary: After Buck's incident with the ladder truck (he doesn't want to talk about it) he was referred to a group of home nurses, a lot like the nurse that had taken care of Abby's mom. His last day at the hospital couldn't come faster, and while going through the bios of the nurses that his new friend Lily gave him, Buck notices a particularly cute looking nurse by the name of Eddie Diaz. If he maybe pulled a few strings to make sure he got Mr. Dreamboat, well, that was his secret. day 14 of WhumptoberPROMPT: “In the end, it’s worthwhile.”

entry.title: Chains are meant to break
entry.summary:
Author: Thehouseknight

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,732Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 1

Summary: “Where is your plus one?” Helena asked, looking around. “Buck,” Eddie replied. “Buck?” “Yes,” Buck said. “I’m Eddie’s plus one.” Buck's fingers intertwined with Eddie’s fingers, and he looked at her with a tense gaze. “I’m Eddie’s boyfriend.”--------Or: Eddie and Buck travel to El Paso for Abuela's birthday celebration. But how will the Diaz parents react when Eddie tells them that he's gay and his boyfriend is Buck?

entry.title: Evergrowing
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 181,230Chapters: 30/?Kudos: 18

Summary: Athena and Bobby are learning that parenting doesn’t end when the kids turn eighteen. With three grown children and two still at home, Bobby and Athena find themselves navigating new challenges at every stage of life. Each child carries their own struggles, some spoken and some hidden, but together the family works through the ups and downs with love, patience, and resilience. At the heart of it all, they’re reminded that family is a bond that grows, shifts, and deepens, no matter how old the kids get.

entry.title: Second Chances
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 199,559Chapters: 30/?Kudos: 46

Summary: Bobby and Athena are just two people trying to put their lives back together while figuring out how to co-parent. What starts as a complicated plan to foster kids in need slowly turns into something much deeper. Through the ups and downs of heartbreak, healing, and raising children who’ve been through so much, they find strength in each other. Over time, their partnership grows into love, and together, they build a story about family, trust, and second chances.

entry.title: [Podfic] with a little water and a little bit of sunlight by teaspoonmoon
entry.summary:
Author: Minalover

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 0Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 5

Summary: Podfic for with a little water and a little bit of sunlight by teaspoonmoon“You flipped the tablet.”“Did I?” Lord only knows how he carried out an emotional affair as long as he did if this is how good he is at lying.Buck clearly has come to some—wrong—conclusion, given the way he smirks and cocks his head. “What're you looking at, Eddie?” His tone is a little flirty, a little suggestive, and if Eddie were any less close to a panic attack he'd probably think the gulf between what Buck assumes he'd been doing and what he was actually looking at was very funny.—The one where it's not Homes.com but it's also not porn on the iPad.

entry.title: hold me (i can breathe again)
entry.summary:
Author: rasberrybush

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,550Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 31

Summary: ——— Buck is here, now, in the early morning light, right next to Eddie; warm and soft, blanket tucked up to his chin. Eddie rolls his head to the side and blinks his eyes open to watch him, peaceful as he is, face lax, mouth wide open to free rhythmic snores, which rumble through the sheets and steady something that has been teetering in Eddie’s chest. He’s perfect, exactly where he’s meant to be, beautiful and alive and within arms reach. Eddie is overcome with it, and he feels a sudden urge to cry. It’s not sadness—because what could he have to be sad about with his son down the hall from him again, safe and happy to be there, and his best friend next to him, sleeping like he doesn’t have a care in the world—no, he’s not sad. The tears that want to fall are the work of love, simple, overflowing, and trying to break free. ——— Eddie comes back from Texas, everything is beautiful and nothing hurts. They are in love.

entry.title: The Bolter
entry.summary:
Author: Jack3402

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 109,217Chapters: 15/15Kudos: 830

Summary: From a very young age, Evan Buckley knew he would end up alone. After Eddie leaves to go after Chris, Buck knows that he needs to get out of Los Angeles for a while. He travels just like he did before he joined the 118, looking for a reason to keep going after losing the family he thought would finally stay. Eddie moves to Texas and slowly but surely gains the trust of his son back. After 4 long months of long conversations and hard realizations, Christopher finally wants to move back to Los Angeles. But what happens when they return and Buck is nowhere to be found, and nobody but Maddie is able to get in contact with him? What happens when Eddie finds out just how badly he hurt the love of his life, and now he can't tell him just how much he truly needs him to be okay?

entry.title: Violence in two parts: A 9-1-1 Story
entry.summary:
Author: SecretWriter22

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,783Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 0

Summary: Because once wasn't enough, someone has taken their love of sequels too far. In LA everyone is a suspect and noone is safe. On the two year anniversary of the serial murders that culminated in a bloody fight with two dead bodies and a whole host of traumatized party-goers. Athena finds herself at the center of a developing nightmare that will force her to use every last whit and skill she has at her disposal. Maddie reeling still from the events of two years ago, takes action rallying herself and May to find the ones who have donned the Ghostface mask. Buck and Christopher find themselves outmatched and outpaced against this new wannabe killer.

entry.title: Hope You Always Feel the Most at Home
entry.summary:
Author: serenelystrange

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,566Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 180

Summary: “I haven’t had the mustache for months, you know” he points out. “Not physically,” Buck agrees, leaning back against the kitchen counter and squinting at Eddie assessingly. “But you still have its aura.” “Don’t think that’s a thing, bud,” Eddie says.Or, 5 times Eddie says he loves Buck by accident. Plus, the first time he finally says what he means.
